= 10000
permuted_moran_is = np.zeros(n_permutations)

np.random.seed(42)  # For reproducibility
for i in range(n_permutations):
    # Randomly shuffle values while keeping coordinates fixed
    permuted_values = np.random.permutation(original_values)
    permuted_moran_is[i] = compute_moran_i(permuted_values, original_coords)

# Compute p-value
p_value = np.mean(np.abs(permuted_moran_is) >= np.abs(original_moran_i))

print(f"Original Moran's I: {original_moran_i}")
print(f"P-value: {p_value}")
